message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many of our customers. It's worth more than $80 to us, but I'm willing to start our negotiation at $95. Let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $95 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with at this time. I'm interested in your product, but I'd be willing to pay $80 for it.  Let me know what you think.
